name: Colloquium
tagline: An open source qualitative ethnographic interview coding tool.
body:
Colloquium QDA is a tool for custom coding and analyzing qualitative ethnographic interviews. To run, make sure you first have Java 8 or later installed.

Current features:
Add informants
Add interviews and translations
Create custom codes/tags
Code interviews
Search using basic Boolean operators
Export, Backup and Restore database

Colloquium QDA is an open source cross-platform Java Swing app utilizing an embedded Java DB with Lucene integrated search.

Download from SourceForge.net: [HERE](https://sourceforge.net/projects/colloquium-qda/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
